mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_arrears_audit (user_id, customer_name, customer_phone, seller_name, seller_phone, ord_no, agency_money, order_money, real_money, cash_money, pos_money, alipay_money, wechat_money, payment_method, distribution_address, distribution_time, remarks, status, create_time, seller_id, picture, whether_repayments, repayment_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{customerName}, #{customerPhone}, #{sellerName}, #{sellerphone}, #{orderNumber}, #{agencyMoney}, #{orderMoney}, #{realMoney}, #{cashMoney}, #{posMoney}, #{alipayMoney}, #{wechatMoney}, #{paymentMethod},#{distributionAddress}, #{distributionTime}, #{remarks}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{sellerId}, #{picture}, #{whetherRepayments}, #{repaymentTime})

SELECT tdc.id oid, tdc.main_order_number, tdc.deliver_type_title, tdc.diy_site_code, tdc.diy_site_name, ss.detailed_address, tdc.delivery_date, tdi.driver, ee.emp_id, ee. NAME, ee.mobile, tdi.wh_no, tdc.shipping_name, tdc.shipping_phone, tdc.shipping_address, tdc.city, tdc.disctrict, tdc.subdistrict, tdc.detail_address FROM td_delivery_info tdi LEFT JOIN td_order_copy tdc ON tdi.order_number = tdc.main_order_number LEFT JOIN st_store ss ON ss.store_code = tdc.diy_site_code LEFT JOIN emp_employee ee ON ee.delivery_clerk_no = tdi.driver WHERE tdc.order_time > '2017-10-01 00:00:00' LIMIT #{size}, 1000;
SELECT * FROM td_order_delivery_time_seq_detail WHERE operation_time > '2017-10-01 00:00:00' LIMIT #{size}, 1000;

SELECT id, diy_site_code, main_order_number, pay_time FROM td_order_copy WHERE pay_time > '2017-10-01 00:00:00' LIMIT #{size}, 1000;
SELECT sku, jx_dif, quantity, dif_total FROM td_order_goods_copy WHERE td_order_id = #{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_logistics_info (oid, ord_no, delivery_type, booking_store_code, booking_store_name, booking_store_address, delivery_time, delivery_clerk_no, delivery_clerk_id, delivery_clerk_name,delivery_clerk_phone ,warehouse, is_owner_receiving, receiver, receiver_phone, shipping_address, residence_name, delivery_city, delivery_county, delivery_street, detailed_address) VALUES (#{oid}, #{ordNo}, #{deliveryType}, #{bookingStoreCode}, #{bookingStoreName}, #{bookingStoreAddress}, #{deliveryTime}, #{deliveryClerkNo}, #{deliveryClerkId}, #{deliveryClerkName}, #{deliveryClerkPhone}, #{warehouse}, #{isOwnerReceiving}, #{receiver}, #{receiverPhone}, #{shippingAddress}, #{residenceName}, #{deliveryCity}, #{deliveryCounty}, #{deliveryStreet}, #{detailedAddress})
